queryinfo.query-statement: SELECT '2' AS step ,code ,code_nm FROM UC_COM_CODEBOOK WHERE up_cd = 'PRJ006' AND code != '000' AND etc1 = ? ORDER BY lup_ord

SELECT prj_seq ,prj_c_cd ,dbo.fn_codebook('PRJ001', prj_c_cd) prj_c_cd_nm ,prj_nm ,prj_desc ,prj_loc ,rl_st_dt ,rl_end_dt ,cntr_man_m ,rl_etrn_m_m ,pgs_rt ,end_f_cd ,dbo.fn_codebook('COM002', end_f_cd) end_f_cd_nm ,prj_c_dtl_cd ,coper_co ,clnt_co ,etrn_m ,dvlp_tool ,dbms ,prj_knd_cd ,rg_dt ,rg_tm ,rg_id ,dbo.fn_user(rg_id, '') rg_nm ,mdf_dt ,mdf_tm ,mdf_id ,dbo.fn_user(mdf_id, '') mdf_nm , jdk_ver , was_type , work_range , pogr_stat , rmk ,dbo.fn_codebook('PRJ011', pogr_stat) pogr_stat_nm FROM UC_PRJ WHERE rl_st_dt <= ? AND rl_end_dt >= ? @prj_knd_cd @prj_c_cd @prj_nm @pogr_stat ORDER BY rl_st_dt desc, prj_c_cd, prj_nm

INSERT INTO UC_PRJ ( prj_c_cd , prj_nm , prj_desc , prj_loc , rl_st_dt , rl_end_dt , cntr_man_m , rl_etrn_m_m , pgs_rt , end_f_cd , rg_dt , rg_tm , rg_id , mdf_dt , mdf_tm , mdf_id , prj_c_dtl_cd , coper_co , clnt_co , etrn_m , dvlp_tool , dbms , prj_knd_cd , jdk_ver , was_type , work_range , pogr_stat , rmk )VALUES ( ? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,(CASE WHEN ?='04' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END ) ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE(),112) ,REPLACE(CONVERT(char , GETDATE(), 108), ':', '') ,? ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE(),112) ,REPLACE(CONVERT(char , GETDATE(), 108), ':', '') ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? )

INSERT INTO UC_SIGN_INFO ( prj_seq ,sign_tp_cd ,sign_stg_cd ,sign_id1 ,sign_id2 ,sign_id3 ,rg_dt ,rg_tm ,rg_id ,mdf_dt ,mdf_tm ,mdf_id ) SELECT --(SELECT MAX(prj_seq) FROM UC_PRJ WHERE rg_id = ?) IDENT_CURRENT('uc_prj') ,sign_tp_cd ,sign_stg_cd ,sign_id1 ,sign_id2 ,sign_id3 ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE(),112) ,REPLACE(CONVERT(char , GETDATE(), 108), ':', '') ,? ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE(),112) ,REPLACE(CONVERT(char , GETDATE(), 108), ':', '') ,? FROM UC_SIGN_INFO WHERE prj_seq = 17 AND sign_tp_cd = '02'

UPDATE UC_PRJ SET prj_c_cd = ? ,prj_nm = ? ,prj_desc = ? ,prj_loc = ? ,rl_st_dt = ? ,rl_end_dt = ? ,cntr_man_m = ? ,rl_etrn_m_m = ? ,pgs_rt = ? ,end_f_cd = (CASE WHEN ?='04' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END ) ,mdf_dt = CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE(),112) ,mdf_tm = REPLACE(CONVERT(char , GETDATE(), 108), ':', '') ,mdf_id = ?
,prj_c_dtl_cd = ? ,coper_co = ? ,clnt_co = ? ,etrn_m = ? ,dvlp_tool = ? ,dbms = ? ,prj_knd_cd = ?
,jdk_ver = ? ,was_type = ? ,work_range = ? ,pogr_stat = ? ,rmk = ?
WHERE prj_seq = ?
DELETE FROM UC_PRJ WHERE prj_seq = ?

SELECT prj_seq ,user_id ,dbo.fn_user(user_id, '') user_nm ,etrn_c_cd ,dbo.fn_codebook('PRJ002', etrn_c_cd) etrn_c_cd_nm ,etrn_du_dt ,etrn_dt ,ot_du_dt ,ot_dt ,rg_dt ,rg_tm ,rg_id ,dbo.fn_user(rg_id, '') rg_nm ,mdf_dt ,mdf_tm ,mdf_id ,dbo.fn_user(mdf_id, '') mdf_nm ,chrgjob ,job_c_cd FROM UC_PRJ_MBR WHERE prj_seq = ? ORDER BY user_id

INSERT INTO UC_PRJ_MBR ( prj_seq ,user_id ,etrn_c_cd ,etrn_du_dt ,etrn_dt ,ot_du_dt ,ot_dt ,chrgjob ,job_c_cd ,rg_dt ,rg_tm ,rg_id ,mdf_dt ,mdf_tm ,mdf_id
)VALUES ( ? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE(),112) ,REPLACE(CONVERT(char , GETDATE(), 108), ':', '') ,? ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE(),112) ,REPLACE(CONVERT(char , GETDATE(), 108), ':', '') ,? )

UPDATE UC_PRJ_MBR SET etrn_c_cd = ? ,etrn_du_dt = ? ,etrn_dt = ? ,ot_du_dt = ? ,ot_dt = ? ,chrgjob = ? ,job_c_cd = ? ,mdf_dt = CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE(),112) ,mdf_tm = REPLACE(CONVERT(char , GETDATE(), 108), ':', '') ,mdf_id = ? WHERE prj_seq = ? AND user_id = ?
SELECT up_cd, code, code_nm, 0 chk FROM UC_COM_CODEBOOK WHERE up_cd = ? AND code !='000' AND use_f = 'Y' ORDER BY lup_ord

SELECT b.mtnc_seq ,b.mtnc_nm ,a.clnt_nm ,a.sch_seq ,a.system_nm ,a.cntr_cd ,a.mtnc_cd ,a.rnm_mtd_cd ,a.rnm_strt_date ,a.rnm_end_date ,a.sch_cont ,a.prcs_cont ,a.prcs_k_id ,dbo.fn_user(prcs_k_id,'') prcs_k_nm ,a.cf_nm ,a.pgm_nm ,a.req_nm ,a.req_date ,a.req_tel ,a.proc_time ,a.rsn_cont ,a.rg_dt ,a.rg_tm ,a.rg_id ,dbo.fn_user(a.rg_id, '') rg_nm ,a.mdf_dt ,a.mdf_tm ,a.mdf_id ,dbo.fn_user(a.mdf_id, '') mdf_nm ,(SELECT count(*) FROM uc_com_file WHERE prg_id='COM_SCH' and up_seq = A.sch_seq) file_cnt , dbo.FN_CODEBOOK('PRJ019', a.end_yn) end_yn_nm , a.end_yn , a.rg_dt + ' ' + a.rg_tm AS rg_dtm , a.mdf_dt + ' ' + a.mdf_tm AS mdf_dtm FROM UC_COM_SCH a, UC_mtnc b WHERE a.mtnc_seq = b.mtnc_seq @mtnc_seq @clnt_nm @cntr_cd @mtnc_cd @rnm_mtd_cd @req_strt_date @req_end_date @prcs_k_id @end_yn ORDER BY req_date desc

INSERT INTO UC_COM_SCH ( mtnc_seq ,clnt_nm ,system_nm ,cntr_cd ,mtnc_cd ,rnm_mtd_cd ,rnm_strt_date ,rnm_end_date ,sch_cont ,prcs_cont ,prcs_k_id ,cf_nm ,pgm_nm ,req_nm ,req_date ,req_tel ,rnm_comp_date ,proc_time ,rsn_cont ,rg_dt ,rg_tm ,rg_id ,mdf_dt ,mdf_tm ,mdf_id ,end_yn )VALUES ( ? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,? ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE(),112) ,REPLACE(CONVERT(char , GETDATE(), 108), ':', '') ,? ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE(),112) ,REPLACE(CONVERT(char , GETDATE(), 108), ':', '') ,? ,? )

UPDATE UC_COM_SCH SET mtnc_seq = ? ,clnt_nm = ? ,system_nm = ? ,cntr_cd = ? ,mtnc_cd = ? ,rnm_mtd_cd = ? ,rnm_strt_date = ? ,rnm_end_date = ? ,sch_cont = ? ,prcs_cont = ? ,prcs_k_id = ? ,cf_nm = ? ,pgm_nm = ? ,req_nm = ? ,req_date = ? ,req_tel = ? ,rnm_comp_date = ? ,proc_time = ? ,rsn_cont = ? ,mdf_dt = CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE(),112) ,mdf_tm = REPLACE(CONVERT(char , GETDATE(), 108), ':', '') ,mdf_id = ? ,end_yn = ? WHERE sch_seq = ?
DELETE FROM UC_COM_SCH WHERE sch_seq = ?
SELECT PRJ_SEQ , PRJ_NM FROM UC_PRJ WHERE CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE(),112) BETWEEN RL_ST_DT AND RL_END_DT ORDER BY PRJ_SEQ

SELECT a.QST_SEQ , b.PRJ_SEQ , b.PRJ_NM , dbo.FN_CODEBOOK('COM010', a.QST_TP_CD) AS QST_TP , a.QST_TP_CD , a.QST_CONT , a.RG_DT+' '+a.RG_TM AS Q_RG_DTM , dbo.FN_USER(a.RG_ID, '') AS Q_RG_NM , a.MDF_DT+' '+a.MDF_TM AS Q_MDF_DTM , dbo.FN_USER(a.MDF_ID, '') AS Q_MDF_NM FROM UC_COM_QST a, UC_PRJ b WHERE a.prj_seq = b.prj_seq AND TYPE_TC='PRJ' @prj_seq @qst_tp_cd @qst_cont ORDER BY QST_SEQ DESC

SELECT ANW_SEQ , ANW_CONT , RG_DT+' '+RG_TM AS A_RG_DTM , dbo.FN_USER(RG_ID, '') AS A_RG_NM , MDF_DT+' '+MDF_TM AS A_MDF_DTM , dbo.FN_USER(MDF_ID, '') AS A_MDF_NM FROM UC_COM_ANW WHERE QST_SEQ = ? ORDER BY ANW_SEQ DESC

INSERT INTO UC_COM_QST ( PRJ_SEQ , QST_TP_CD , QST_CONT , USE_F , RG_DT , RG_TM , RG_ID , MDF_DT , MDF_TM , MDF_ID , TYPE_TC )VALUES( ? , ? , ? , 'Y' , CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE(),112) , REPLACE(CONVERT(char , GETDATE(), 108), ':', '') , ? , CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE(),112) , REPLACE(CONVERT(char , GETDATE(), 108), ':', '') , ? , 'PRJ' )

UPDATE UC_COM_QST SET PRJ_SEQ = ? , QST_TP_CD = ? , QST_CONT = ? , MDF_DT = CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE(),112) , MDF_TM = REPLACE(CONVERT(char , GETDATE(), 108), ':', '') , MDF_ID = ? WHERE QST_SEQ = ?
DELETE UC_COM_QST WHERE QST_SEQ = ?
DELETE UC_COM_ANW WHERE QST_SEQ = ?

INSERT INTO UC_COM_ANW ( QST_SEQ , ANW_CONT , USE_F , RG_DT , RG_TM , RG_ID , MDF_DT , MDF_TM , MDF_ID )VALUES( ? , ? , 'Y' , CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE(),112) , REPLACE(CONVERT(char , GETDATE(), 108), ':', '') , ? , CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE(),112) , REPLACE(CONVERT(char , GETDATE(), 108), ':', '') , ? )
UPDATE UC_COM_ANW SET ANW_CONT = ? , MDF_DT = CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE(),112) , MDF_TM = REPLACE(CONVERT(char , GETDATE(), 108), ':', '') , MDF_ID = ? WHERE ANW_SEQ = ?
DELETE UC_COM_ANW WHERE ANW_SEQ = ?
SELECT file_seq , file_nm , new_file_nm , rg_dt , rg_tm , rg_id , dbo.FN_USER(rg_id, '') AS rg_nm FROM UC_COM_FILE WHERE prg_id = ? AND up_seq = ? ORDER BY file_seq ASC

INSERT INTO UC_COM_FILE ( up_seq, prg_id, file_nm, new_file_nm , rg_dt, rg_tm, rg_id, mdf_dt, mdf_tm, mdf_id ) VALUES ( ?, ?, ?, ? , CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE(),112) , REPLACE(CONVERT(char , GETDATE(), 108), ':', '') , ? , CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE(),112) , REPLACE(CONVERT(char , GETDATE(), 108), ':', '') , ? )
DELETE FROM UC_COM_FILE WHERE prg_id = ? AND up_seq = ? @file_seq
SELECT IDENT_CURRENT('UC_COM_QST') AS seq

INSERT INTO UC_COM_FILE ( up_seq, prg_id, file_nm, new_file_nm , rg_dt, rg_tm, rg_id, mdf_dt, mdf_tm, mdf_id ) (SELECT IDENT_CURRENT('UC_COM_SCH'), ?, ?, ? , CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE(),112) , REPLACE(CONVERT(char , GETDATE(), 108), ':', '') , ? , CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE(),112) , REPLACE(CONVERT(char , GETDATE(), 108), ':', '') , ? )

SELECT prj_nm, rl_st_dt, rl_end_dt, b.etrn_dt, b.ot_dt, a.clnt_co, a.coper_co , dbo.fn_codebook('PRJ007', dvlp_tool) dvlp_tool , dbo.fn_codebook('PRJ008', dbms) dbms FROM uc_prj a, uc_prj_mbr b WHERE a.prj_seq = b.prj_seq AND b.user_id = ? ORDER BY rl_st_dt desc

SELECT mtnc_seq , mtnc_nm , clnt_corp_seq , mtnc_system , mtnc_type , mtnc_cost , strt_date , end_date , regular_chk , coop_corp_seq , dvlp_frwk , a.rmk , prj_seq --, SUBSTRING(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), CAST(strt_date AS DATETIME), 102),1,7) +' ~ '+ -- SUBSTRING(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), CAST(end_date AS DATETIME), 102),1,7) mtnc_period , (CASE WHEN strt_date IS NULL THEN ' ' ELSE SUBSTRING(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), CAST(strt_date AS DATETIME), 102),1,7) END) + (CASE WHEN strt_date IS NULL AND end_date IS NULL THEN ' ' ELSE ' ~ ' END) + (CASE WHEN end_date IS NULL THEN ' ' ELSE SUBSTRING(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), CAST(end_date AS DATETIME), 102),1,7) END) mtnc_period , (SELECT prj_nm FROM uc_prj WHERE prj_seq=a.prj_seq) prj_nm , corp_nm clnt_corp_nm , corp_nm coop_corp_nm , mtnc_cd, mtd_cd, corp_chrg_nm , chrg_user_id, dbo.fn_user(chrg_user_id,'') chrg_user_id_nm , cs_user_id, dbo.fn_user(cs_user_id,'') cs_user_id_nm , bsn_user_id, dbo.fn_user(bsn_user_id,'') bsn_user_id_nm , rmt_tool, rmt_rmk , a.mdf_dt , dbo.fn_user(a.mdf_id, '') as mdf_nm FROM uc_mtnc a left join uc_prj_corp b on a.clnt_corp_seq = b.corp_seq WHERE 1=1 @clnt_corp_nm @useyn @mtnc_cd @mtnc_cost @regular_chk @mtd_cd @user_chrg @user_cs @user_bsn ORDER BY clnt_corp_nm, strt_date DESC, mtnc_nm
SELECT COUNT(sch_seq) cnt FROM uc_com_sch WHERE mtnc_seq = ?

UPDATE uc_mtnc SET mtnc_nm = ? , clnt_corp_seq = ? , mtnc_system = ? , mtnc_type = ? , mtnc_cost = ? , strt_date = ? , end_date = ? , regular_chk = ? , coop_corp_seq = ? , dvlp_frwk = ? , rmk = ? , prj_seq = ? , corp_chrg_nm = ? , chrg_user_id = ? , cs_user_id = ? , bsn_user_id = ? , rmt_tool = ? , rmt_rmk = ? , mtnc_cd = ? , mtd_cd = ? , mdf_dt = CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE(),112) , mdf_tm = REPLACE(CONVERT(char , GETDATE(), 108), ':', '') , mdf_id = ?
WHERE mtnc_seq = ?

INSERT INTO uc_mtnc ( mtnc_nm , clnt_corp_seq , mtnc_system , mtnc_type , mtnc_cost , strt_date , end_date , regular_chk , coop_corp_seq , dvlp_frwk , rmk , prj_seq , corp_chrg_nm , chrg_user_id, cs_user_id, bsn_user_id, rmt_tool, rmt_rmk, mtnc_cd, mtd_cd , rg_dt , rg_tm , rg_id , mdf_dt , mdf_tm , mdf_id
)VALUES( ?, ?, ?, ?, ? , ?, ?, ?, ?, ? , ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ? , ?, ? , CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE(),112), REPLACE(CONVERT(char , GETDATE(), 108), ':', ''), ? , CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE(),112), REPLACE(CONVERT(char , GETDATE(), 108), ':', ''), ? )

SELECT TOP 40 mtnc_seq , mtnc_nm , clnt_corp_seq , mtnc_system , mtnc_type , mtnc_cost , strt_date , end_date , regular_chk , coop_corp_seq , dvlp_frwk , rmk , prj_seq , rg_dt , rg_tm --, SUBSTRING(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), CAST(strt_date AS DATETIME), 102),1,7) +' ~ '+ -- SUBSTRING(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), CAST(end_date AS DATETIME), 102),1,7) mtnc_period , (CASE WHEN strt_date IS NULL THEN ' ' ELSE SUBSTRING(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), CAST(strt_date AS DATETIME), 102),1,7) END) + (CASE WHEN strt_date IS NULL AND end_date IS NULL THEN ' ' ELSE ' ~ ' END) + (CASE WHEN end_date IS NULL THEN ' ' ELSE SUBSTRING(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), CAST(end_date AS DATETIME), 102),1,7) END) mtnc_period , (SELECT prj_nm FROM uc_prj WHERE prj_seq=a.prj_seq) prj_nm , (SELECT corp_nm FROM uc_prj_corp WHERE corp_seq=a.clnt_corp_seq) clnt_corp_nm , (SELECT corp_nm FROM uc_prj_corp WHERE corp_seq=a.coop_corp_seq) coop_corp_nm FROM uc_mtnc a ORDER BY rg_dt DESC, rg_tm DESC
DELETE FROM uc_mtnc WHERE mtnc_seq = ?

SELECT b.mtnc_system , b.regular_chk , dbo.fn_codebook('PRJ015', b.regular_chk) AS regular_chk_excel , b.mtnc_cost , dbo.fn_codebook('PRJ014', b.mtnc_cost) AS mtnc_cost_excel , b.mtnc_type , dbo.fn_codebook('PRJ017', b.mtnc_type) AS mtnc_type_excel , (CASE WHEN b.strt_date IS NULL THEN ' ' ELSE SUBSTRING(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), CAST(b.strt_date AS DATETIME), 102),1,7) END) + (CASE WHEN b.strt_date IS NULL AND b.end_date IS NULL THEN ' ' ELSE ' ~ ' END) + (CASE WHEN b.end_date IS NULL THEN ' ' ELSE SUBSTRING(CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), CAST(b.end_date AS DATETIME), 102),1,7) END) AS mtnc_date , b.clnt_corp_seq , (SELECT corp_nm FROM uc_prj_corp WHERE corp_seq=b.clnt_corp_seq) AS clnt_corp_nm , a.mtnc_dtl_seq , a.clnt_corp_loc , a.consl_offc , a.consl_offc_loc , a.ptnr_offc , a.rmt_pgm , a.cnet_inf , a.rmt_id , a.rmt_pwd , a.rmt_rmk , a.ucare_url , a.ucare_id , a.ucare_pwd , a.ucare_rmk , a.rg_id , a.rg_dt , a.rg_tm , a.mdf_id , a.mdf_dt , a.mdf_tm FROM uc_mtnc_dtl a RIGHT OUTER JOIN uc_mtnc b ON a.mtnc_seq = b.mtnc_seq WHERE b.mtnc_seq = ?

UPDATE uc_mtnc_dtl SET clnt_corp_loc = ? , consl_offc = ? , consl_offc_loc = ? , ptnr_offc = ? , rmt_pgm = ? , cnet_inf = ? , rmt_id = ? , rmt_pwd = ? , rmt_rmk = ? , ucare_url = ? , ucare_id = ? , ucare_pwd = ? , ucare_rmk = ? , mdf_id = ? , mdf_dt = CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE(),112) , mdf_tm = REPLACE(CONVERT(char , GETDATE(), 108), ':', '') WHERE mtnc_seq = ? IF @@ROWCOUNT=0 INSERT INTO uc_mtnc_dtl ( mtnc_seq, clnt_corp_loc, consl_offc, consl_offc_loc, ptnr_offc , rmt_pgm, cnet_inf, rmt_id, rmt_pwd, rmt_rmk , ucare_url, ucare_id, ucare_pwd, ucare_rmk , rg_id, rg_dt, rg_tm, mdf_id, mdf_dt, mdf_tm ) VALUES ( ?, ?, ?, ?, ? , ?, ?, ?, ?, ? , ?, ?, ?, ? , ?, CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE(),112), REPLACE(CONVERT(char , GETDATE(), 108), ':', ''), ?, CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE(),112), REPLACE(CONVERT(char , GETDATE(), 108), ':', '') )

SELECT a.srvr_inf_seq , a.mtnc_seq , a.prm_kind , a.prm_kind AS prm_kind_cd , a.prm_nm , a.srvr_ip , a.srvr_os , a.os_cnet_inf , a.prm_cnet_inf , 1 AS add_del_index FROM uc_mtnc_srvr_inf a WHERE a.mtnc_seq = ?

INSERT INTO uc_mtnc_srvr_inf ( mtnc_seq , prm_kind, prm_nm , srvr_ip, srvr_os , os_cnet_inf, prm_cnet_inf , rg_id, rg_dt, rg_tm , mdf_id, mdf_dt, mdf_tm ) VALUES ( ? , ?, ? , ?, ? , ?, ? , ?, CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE(),112), REPLACE(CONVERT(char , GETDATE(), 108), ':', '') , ?, CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE(),112), REPLACE(CONVERT(char , GETDATE(), 108), ':', '') )

UPDATE uc_mtnc_srvr_inf SET prm_kind = ? , prm_nm = ? , srvr_ip = ? , srvr_os = ? , os_cnet_inf = ? , prm_cnet_inf = ? , mdf_id = ? , mdf_dt = CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE(),112) , mdf_tm = REPLACE(CONVERT(char , GETDATE(), 108), ':', '') WHERE mtnc_seq = ? AND srvr_inf_seq = ?
DELETE FROM uc_mtnc_srvr_inf WHERE mtnc_seq = ? AND srvr_inf_seq = ?
SELECT a.work_inf_seq , a.mtnc_seq , a.pgm_lrg , a.pgm_mrg , a.pgm_nm , 1 AS add_del_index FROM uc_mtnc_work_inf a WHERE a.mtnc_seq = ?

INSERT INTO uc_mtnc_work_inf ( mtnc_seq, pgm_lrg, pgm_mrg, pgm_nm, rg_id, rg_dt, rg_tm, mdf_id, mdf_dt, mdf_tm ) VALUES ( ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE(),112), REPLACE(CONVERT(char , GETDATE(), 108), ':', ''), ?, CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE(),112), REPLACE(CONVERT(char , GETDATE(), 108), ':', '') )

UPDATE uc_mtnc_work_inf SET pgm_lrg = ? , pgm_mrg = ? , pgm_nm = ? , mdf_id = ? , mdf_dt = CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE(),112) , mdf_tm = REPLACE(CONVERT(char , GETDATE(), 108), ':', '') WHERE mtnc_seq = ? AND work_inf_seq = ?
DELETE FROM uc_mtnc_work_inf WHERE mtnc_seq = ? AND work_inf_seq = ?

SELECT a.chrg_usr_seq , a.mtnc_seq , a.chrg_usr_nm , a.chrg_duty , a.chrg_corp , a.chrg_job , a.mobl_no , dbo.uf_telmask(a.mobl_no) AS mobl_no_excel , a.tel_no , dbo.uf_telmask(a.tel_no) AS tel_no_excel , a.email , 1 AS add_del_index FROM uc_mtnc_chrg_usr a WHERE a.mtnc_seq = ?

INSERT INTO uc_mtnc_chrg_usr ( mtnc_seq, chrg_usr_nm, chrg_duty, chrg_corp, chrg_job, mobl_no, tel_no, email, rg_id, rg_dt, rg_tm, mdf_id, mdf_dt, mdf_tm ) VALUES ( ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE(),112), REPLACE(CONVERT(char , GETDATE(), 108), ':', ''), ?, CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE(),112), REPLACE(CONVERT(char , GETDATE(), 108), ':', '') )

UPDATE uc_mtnc_chrg_usr SET chrg_usr_nm = ? , chrg_duty = ? , chrg_corp = ? , chrg_job = ? , mobl_no = ? , tel_no = ? , email = ? , mdf_id = ? , mdf_dt = CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE(),112) , mdf_tm = REPLACE(CONVERT(char , GETDATE(), 108), ':', '') WHERE mtnc_seq = ? AND chrg_usr_seq = ?
DELETE FROM uc_mtnc_chrg_usr WHERE mtnc_seq = ? AND chrg_usr_seq = ?
SELECT corp_seq, corp_nm, rmk FROM uc_prj_corp a WHERE 1=1 @corp_nm ORDER BY corp_nm ASC

SELECT (a.cnt+b.cnt) cnt, a.cnt AS mtnc_cnt, b.cnt AS prj_cnt FROM ( SELECT COUNT(mtnc_seq) cnt FROM uc_mtnc WHERE (clnt_corp_seq = ? OR coop_corp_seq = ?) ) a , ( SELECT COUNT(prj_seq) cnt FROM uc_prj WHERE (coper_co = ? OR clnt_co = ?) ) b

INSERT INTO uc_prj_corp ( corp_nm , rmk , rg_dt , rg_tm , rg_id , mdf_dt , mdf_tm , mdf_id
)VALUES( ?, ? , CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE(),112), REPLACE(CONVERT(char , GETDATE(), 108), ':', ''), ? , CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE(),112), REPLACE(CONVERT(char , GETDATE(), 108), ':', ''), ? )
UPDATE uc_prj_corp SET corp_nm = ? , rmk = ? , mdf_dt = CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE(),112) , mdf_tm = REPLACE(CONVERT(char , GETDATE(), 108), ':', '') , mdf_id = ? WHERE corp_seq = ?
DELETE FROM uc_prj_corp WHERE corp_seq = ?
SELECT TOP 40 corp_seq, corp_nm, rmk, rg_dt, rg_tm FROM uc_prj_corp a WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY rg_dt DESC, rg_tm DESC
